name: Snowy
description: Snowy is an adorable dog, he likes to run around and play with anyone. Snowy is very friendly towards anyone, even with other animals.
suggestion: Play with Snowy often so that he does not feel lonely. Bring Snowy out for a walk every day because that's his hobby.

name: Lavender
description: Lavender is an adorable dog, she likes to run around and play with anyone. Lavender is very friendly towards anyone, even with other animals.
suggestion: Play with Lavender often so that she does not feel lonely. Lavender has a lot of furs, have a vaccumm or a broom ready!

name: Tabby
description: Tabby is a cool and quiet cat. Tabby does not need too much attention to survive.
suggestion: Bring Tabby his favourite toy so that he can be happy around you.

name: Puff
description: Puff is a cool and quiet cat. Puff does not like to be in a cold environment, he prefers a warm room.
suggestion: Have a heater on in the winter so Puff can be comfortable.

name: Money
description: Money is a quiet dog. Money does not play with other his friends frequently. However, Money is definitely a loyal and obedient dog.

name: Parker
description: Parker is a lovely Persian cat. Parker likes to play around outside. Parker is also very friendly towards anyone.
suggestion: Bring Parker out for a walk sometimes. Do not worry about having other animals around Parker.

name: Huahua
description: Chihuahua is not very friendly with other animals. However, Huahua knows how to get along with their owners well.
suggestion: Keep Huahua away from other animals to avoid fights

name: Lucky
description: Lucky is just beautiful in every way. Luna is friendly and likes to stick to his owner.
suggestion: Let Lucky be Lucky and prepare a vaccumm to clean the furs.

name: Luna
description: Luna is just beautiful in every way. Luna is friendly and likes to stick to his owner.
suggestion: Let Luna be Luna and prepare a vaccumm to clean the furs.

name: Tom
description: Tom is a very smart cat. Tom is very hardworking and master every skills you can ever imagine. However, Tom is very weak in catching a mouse.
suggestion: Don't let Tom stay around with a mouse named Jerry, your house will be a mess instantly.
